welcome: Hooray, you're here! The day just got better - enjoy the following tips!
text_segment: A section of text like this is known as a text segment. Start rockin' your translations now!
down_shortcut: Arriba, Arriba! Andale, Andale! Be fast as Speedy Gonzales. Just hit the DOWN key to save and go to the next text segment, once you're done.
statuses: Houston, we have no problem. Keep track of the progress of your translations by statuses at any time.
status_shortcut:
You can change the status by using one of the shortcut keys: e.g. CTRL+ENTER = Translated.
 You can see other shortcuts by clicking the Sign Off button
placeholder_rwschecks:
We just like to see you happy, that's why RWS checks automatically check translations for predetermined criteria.
Among other checks RWS verifies if {{placeholders}} used in the original text are also present in translated texts.
